column1:
The  next 
important  evidence  was  of  the  Investigating  Police Officer of the

station. The  accident 
had  been  reported 
to the police 
Wellampitiya  Police
station  at  about  10.20 am.  He had visited the scene, recorded  statements,  and
drawn the sketch of the scene.

Police  Officer  stated  there  was  a  car  on the left side of the white line  on 
the
middle of  the  road  and the  front  of  the  car  was turned towards the right side.
